Unions.Name: American Union (A.U.)
Unions.Military: Extremely powerful, slightly above Jonah's military.
Unions.Other Information: Representatives are 1/100,000 of the combined union population. Members must follow all AUTs and entities defined by the AUTs (such as departments and representatives), and are taxed 5% monthly for the Union to give to foreign nations, spend towards the union and its nations, or put into reserve.

Unions.Name: Calidum Union
Unions.Other Information: Similar to Jonah’s Colony in terms of innovation, industries and government, after the Union’s territory was conquered by John Sith and split into many countries. See DGD-B CA.C21JN - WHO WE ARE and DGD-B CA.C21JU - THE CALIDUM UNION.

Unions.Name: Post-War Arjun and Calidum States (PWACIS)
Unions.Military: Uses Calidum Union military + Arjun’s Colony military for a Jonah level military.
Unions.Other Information: Nations pay taxes to the nation/union that gave them independence. These nations must also supply additional financial or military aid to their parent nation/union when the nation/union requests it. Military aid amount is decided by the PWACIS, and financial aid is usually up to the nation and can be as low as $1000, but rarely, PWCAIS can force up to a 10% wealth contribution. In return, nations can choose to vote in their parent nation’s elections, and PWACIS supplies great military and financial defense to the member nations from Calidum and Arjun’s Colony.

Nations.Name: Desemar
Nations.Military: Tiny military. Will attempt to move Japan and deliver treaties by missiles during times of war. Mainly focuses on research for the war.
Nations.Location/Land: Southwest Northern America (except Texas, California, Wyoming + panhandle), as well as Mexico and western Asian Russia.
Nations.Other Information: One of the three A.U. founders, although the original leader Kye Urgolites has since become a Union representative. Known for risky feats (moving Japan, spending everything on a moon mission) and massive technological advances (solar farm).

Nations.Name: Medilli
Nations.Military: Rusty, trusty, dusty, crusty, busty, gusty, lusty, and musty military.
Nations.Other Information: Made from Cameron’s colony after Kye bought it. Special government structure with no leader, but instead a senate, direct voting by the people, and a court.

Nations.Name: Couria
Nations.Military: Technologically and strategically advanced nonviolent sub-Calidum military.
Nations.Other Information: Made from Cameron’s colony after Kye bought it. Known for economic stability, having amazing business and trade cities.

Nations.Name: Jonah's Colony
Nations.Military: The ultimate nation military, only surpassed by the A.U. itself.
Nations.Location/Land: Hawaii, Greenland, the subtropical region of China, the Phillipines, the Moluccas, Java, Sulawesi, and the east Arabian peninsula.
Nations.Other Information: Cut ties with the Jonah Empires long ago. Known for a large landmass (despite multiple invasions), high wealth (highest in the world), Jonah leading a former empire (arguably the most infamous in history), and farming.

Nations.Name: Rivertopia
Nations.Military: Large sized and very modern military, used to defeat Lake.
Nations.Location/Land: The Caribbean and all islands in southeast Asia and southern Oceania unclaimed by other nations.
Nations.Other Information: For the colony’s collapse, see AUT 9 and its two subtreaties. One of the three A.U. founders.

Nations.Name: Arjun's Colony
Nations.Military: Modern and very large army, along with an air force and cyber force. Sub-Jonah level.
Nations.Location/Land: South Australia, Indian subcontinent + Afghanistan, middle northwestern Africa, Wyoming + panhandle, and coastal SoCal.
Nations.Other Information: Powerful, developing, and very progressive nation, known for quick change and the Vulture party. Re-created 2024.11.05 (see AUT 13 for more info).

Nations.Name: Colony Freezing
Nations.Military: Large, strong, and stable military!
Nations.Other Information: No longer related to the Freezing Empire. See THE FREEZING ELECTIONS (DGD LIST) for elections.

Nations.Name: United Cold Nation
Nations.Military: Uses a small but very effective peaceful military, trying not to resort to violence.
Nations.Location/Land: Northwest North America excluding the most northwest.
Nations.Other Information: See THE UCN ELECTIONS (DGD LIST). Known for these elections, which can affect the course of the entire American Union.

Nations.Name: West Cogitium
Nations.Military: No military, but has amazing tech and also can use 1/6 of Gametopia's military.
Nations.Other Information: Split of Gametopia after there were many tensions due to the arrival of Trridiv Sivakumar, as described in DGD-I CO.C21JT - TENSIONS IN COGITIUM

Nations.Name: Gametopia
Nations.Military: A sub-Couria military with 350K titanium AI bots as well as a large fleet of carbon fiber-armored millitary men with powered exoskeletons.
Nations.Other Information: Created by AustraGPT 3.0 as Cogitium, a “tech supercenter”, but the country was taken over by the human Frazier Barton to widen scope and AustraGPT now owns the company Cogitium only. However, after a series of riots, Trridiv Sivakumar was appointed as co-leader of the nation, later sole leader after Frazier Barton's dissappearance, making many drastic changes in a matter of days, especially regarding military, as described in DGD-I CO.C21JT - TENSIONS IN COGITIUM.

Nations.Name: Muzak Republic
Nations.Military: Sub-Calidum level military, very powerful.
Nations.Other Information: Formerly the Non-Empire led by Jared Muzak, only taking land if the people allowed it and started no wars, following AUT 6. When the empire fell they lost a lot of their power, then changed to be a republic led by Harry Muzak.

Nations.Name: Great Routira
Nations.Military: Sticks and stones.
Nations.Other Information: Oldest civilization still around. Their people moved from Australia to Asia to South America, and now finally back to Australia. Language has no vowels, so transliteration of names is weird. Very different from Routia, which stayed in South America. See AUT 1.1 for more info. Technically under PWACIS, as the eastern province made an agreement for $1T in investment so that Arjun would get 5% taxes for the rich and 0.5% for the middle class as well as PWACIS control in the province.

Nations.Name: Nacu
Nations.Military: Tiny developing military.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 5% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Sacu
Nations.Military: Tiny developing military.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 10% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Infrigor
Nations.Military: A.U. backup military.
Nations.Location/Land: Alaska but going east ¼ the way to the east coast.
Nations.Other Information: Formerly Cold Place Thing. Home to beautiful landscapes and mountains in the far north. Name means “In the cold” in Latin. Made an agreement for $1.5T in investment so that Kye would get 7% of proceeds.

Nations.Name: The Kameropotamias
Nations.Military: A.U. backup military.
Nations.Other Information: Not recognized by Cameron due to a long-standing territory dispute, although the NCT does recognize them. Not recognized by Jonah due to a similar dispute. Recognized by River despite a territory dispute. They are known for their diverse European culture.

Nations.Name: New Cameron Territory
Nations.Military: Medium sized, strong, and stable military!
Nations.Other Information: Formerly owned by Cameron, one of the three A.U. founders. Cameron gave up the nation after he left the A.U., so the nation reformed under Lohan Thea. Technically under PWACIS, as the Portugal province made an agreement for $6T in investment so that Arjun would get 12% of proceeds, PWACIS control in the province, and some government power.

Nations.Name: Hippity
Nations.Military: Medieval imperial military.
Nations.Location/Land: Western non-mainland Europe, including Iceland and the British Isles.
Nations.Other Information: Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. A symbolic continuation of the Hippity Hoppity civilization that lasted over 2 thousand years before being conquered by the Jonahs. Made an agreement for $1T in investment so that Kye would get 5% of proceeds.

Nations.Name: Routira-Bredian Democracy
Nations.Military: Ancient imperial military.
Nations.Other Information: Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Technically under PWACIS, as the North Italy province made an agreement for $3.5T in investment so that Arjun would get 10% of proceeds, PWACIS control in the province, and some government power.

Nations.Name: European Cultural Union
Nations.Military: Small military.
Nations.Other Information: Formerly True Middle Place. Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Known for diverse cultures, similar to The Kameropotamias. Made an agreement for $1T in investment so that NCT would get 7% of proceeds.

Nations.Name: Scandinavia But Better
Nations.Military: Small naval force that patrols the coast, as well as 7 repurposed fishing ships with trained sailors that operate the guns.
Nations.Location/Land: Northern Middle Europe, mostly Scandinavia/Fennoscandia. In a dispute with Rivertopia's territory.
Nations.Other Information: Their motto is “unio in montibus et in campis et mare”. Created when Kye’s Colony and the NCT split up their territories. Made an agreement for $1.5T in investment so that NCT would get 10% of proceeds. Rebel Man recently retired and is now replaced by the acting president River Lozada. He promises more presidential funding for education, infrastructure, and Scandinavian goods, especially furniture. Rest in pieces River Lozenge.

Nations.Name: People's Traditional Siberian Land (PTSL)
Nations.Military: Describe the military of this nation. It may be subjective, and it should be qualitative.
Nations.Other Information: Very traditional. Very cold. Lots of trees. Currently extremely poor.

Nations.Name: Lesnazemlya
Nations.Military: Describe the military of this nation. It may be subjective, and it should be qualitative.
Nations.Other Information: Means "forest land".

Nations.Name: Central Asian Dictatorship
Nations.Military: Sub-Jonah military. Military conscription and drafting is the top priority here.
Nations.Other Information: Very openly a dictatorship led by the Great Chairman Joe Nah, who emposes strict rules in order to "ensure development".

Nations.Name: Ploquci
Nations.Military: Describe the military of this nation. It may be subjective, and it should be qualitative.
Nations.Other Information: Name was made by the first president, Ploquic Sith, 2nd cousin once removed of John Sith. Not part of the Calidum Union.

Nations.Name: Peninsular Island
Nations.Military: New fresh military with navy! But no air force currently.
Nations.Location/Land: Western and eastern New Guinea peninsulas.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. The eastern side contains a large tech center while the western is more focused on nature. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Middle Guinea
Nations.Military: New military but still has some rusty old tanks!
Nations.Location/Land: Western middle section of New Guinea.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Mostly focused on preserving nature, especially in cities. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Tribal Confederacy
Nations.Military: Still has an old military. Mostly bows and arrows.
Nations.Location/Land: Eastern middle section of New Guinea.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Focused on keeping tribal lands and going back to the times of the past. Made out of mini-states dedicated to each tribe. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Vitamonte
Nations.Military: Modern military, no war monkeys or navy unfortunately.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Name means life + volcanos. Pays 1% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Little Saint James
Nations.Military: Small military currently. Developing navy and trying to tame Gilbert.
Nations.Location/Land: California except for southern coastal counties. The island of Little Saint James is not in this nation, despite the name.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Popular tourist destination because of its redwoods and sequoias. Gilbert resides in Little Saint James. Pays 5% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Siddartha
Nations.Military: Modern military, with war monkeys!
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 10% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: Chola Republic
Nations.Military: Medium modern military including navy. Developing air force.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 8% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: East Asian Democracy
Nations.Military: Large modern military with navy.
Nations.Other Information: Created after Arjun conquered Jonah, making this nation part of PWACIS. Pays 15% taxes to Arjun.

Nations.Name: South Calidum
Nations.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
Nations.Location/Land: Northeast Africa down to the middle.
Nations.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Nations.Name: Middle Calidum
Nations.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
Nations.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Nations.Name: North Calidum
Nations.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
Nations.Location/Land: Middle East excluding the Arabian Peninsula & Persia.
Nations.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Nations.Name: East Calidum
Nations.Military: Uses the Calidum Union military as its own.
Nations.Location/Land: Persia, stopping at the Persian Gulf.
Nations.Other Information: Part of the Calidum Union and PWAICS.

Nations.Name: Routia
Nations.Military: Rusty yet trusty large military.
Nations.Other Information: Growing power. This is the Routia that did not move back to Australia, while Great Routira did.

Nations.Name: Chikan
Nations.Military: Old medium size military.
Nations.Other Information: Does not have k chickens.

Nations.Name: Munkey
Nations.Military: Old and small sized military.
Nations.Other Information: Has lots of monkeys.

Nations.Name: New Emeio
Nations.Military: New modern military with a small navy.
Nations.Other Information: Formerly arguably the least developed country, now a major tech center with a new government after Arjun's “invasion”, supplying supercomputers and technology parts. In a new agreement with Cogitium following the recent surge of Tridiv, investing in each other.

Nations.Name: Colony Hot
Nations.Military: Large military, still a bit old but very stable and modern compared to neighbours.
Nations.Location/Land: In Africa, east of New Emeio.
Nations.Other Information: Largest and second most developed African country.

Nations.Name: Billy
Nations.Military: Mostly modern but small military.
Nations.Location/Land: In Africa, south of Colony Hot.
Nations.Other Information: Used to have more land, but they merged with Colony Hot and when the Non-Empire conquered the modern-day territory and fell, they became  with new borders.

Nations.Name: Bun Pik
Nations.Military: Small and old military.
Nations.Other Information: Currently in the Muzak Dynasty, the 12th Holy Bun Era, ruled by former Non-Empire officials.

Nations.Name: Chainah
Nations.Military: Medium sized but very old military.
Nations.Location/Land: In Africa, east of Bun Pik.
Nations.Other Information: Quite a respectable economy for its size despite conquerings from Calidum, possibly due to proximity with it. Known as a rapidly developing country with lush scenery, but also a major criminal haven due to its lack of strict regulations.

Nations.Name: Terratoo
Nations.Military: Small and very old military except for the navy.
Nations.Other Information: Previously part of Chainah, but split from it and was able to avoid Calidum and the Non-Empire’s conquest.

Nations.Name: New Ævolo
Nations.Military: Modern and medium sized military, inherited from the Non-Empire.
Nations.Location/Land: In Africa, south of Bun Pik.
Nations.Other Information: Quite different from the old, more corrupt, Ævolo, having a Non-Empire based culture and government.
